title: Fantastical wants to fix meeting scheduling with privacy-focused Openings and enhanced Proposals
content:
Fantastical is releasing today its biggest update ever with new tools to schedule personal and work meetings, as well as an improved calendar view with a new option.

more…

The post Fantastical wants to fix meeting scheduling with privacy-focused Openings and enhanced Proposals appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Fantastical is releasing its biggest update with new tools to schedule meetings, as well as an improved calendar view with Quarter option.
